Room.Name: Audience Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main audience chamber of the elven shrine.
Room.LongDescription: To the east you see a great golden statue of Larethian surrounded by an immense ebony and silver altar. Below the statue is a reflecting pool of an amber liquid, and beside the exquisitely carved statue there are banks of sweet smelling candles. Looking north you see the wedding chapel. An elegantly thick carpet covers the floor, and velvet drapes hang on the walls, producing a very quiet ambience.
